title: make LBHttpSolrServer zombie checks non-distrib and non-scoring
description:
The behaviour we saw was that shards were sometimes processing a lot of mysterious 

rows=0&q=*:*

 requests. These we think came from 

LBHttpSolrServer

 which was checking up on a zombie server.
